name: @google-cloud/tasks
description: Cloud Tasks API client for Node.js
author: Google LLC

scripts.test: repo-tools test run --cmd npm -- run cover
scripts.cover: nyc --reporter=lcov mocha --require intelli-espower-loader test/*.js && nyc report
scripts.samples-test: cd samples/ && npm link ../ && npm test && cd ../
scripts.lint: repo-tools lint --cmd eslint -- src/ samples/ system-test/ test/ smoke-test/
scripts.prettier: repo-tools exec -- prettier --write src/*.js src/*/*.js samples/*.js samples/*/*.js test/*.js test/*/*.js system-test/*.js system-test/*/*.js smoke-test/*.js
scripts.system-test: repo-tools test run --cmd mocha -- system-test/*.js smoke-test/*.js --timeout 600000
